page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Employers within a 5 mile radius, providing permanent or seasonal work for 1/3 of adults include; M.O.D, 2 haulage firms, a major scrap metal reclamation firm, coal merchant, publisher, garage, 2 shops/post offices, school, farmers and market gardeners. Other opportunities exist in light industry, food processing, construction and domestic work. Nearby towns of Evesham and Stratford are centres for professional, clerical and retail work. Some people commute to Birmingham, Coventry and beyond. Self employed include an electrician, a plumber, builders, carpenters and decorators. There is no serious unemployment nor migration of the young (except for further education). However, high house prices may soon prevent young locals from remaining in this area.
